title: Giant longitudinal and transverse magneto thermoelectric effects in a van del Waals semimetal TaCo2Te2
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01857E, Paper
Zhigang Gui, Ye Yang, Xikai Wen, Yuqing Zhang, Yikang Li, Yanjun Li, Qingyuan Liu, Mingjie Wang, Jianjun Ying, Xianhui Chen
Nowadays thermoelectric (TE) cooling technologies are hindered by the paucity of efficient low-temperature TE materials, which are critical to both cryogenic research and practical applications. Herein, we present the discovery...
